text: The Tejano Monument is a memorial commemorating the impact of Tejanos on Texas culture and history, installed on the Texas State Capitol grounds in Austin, Texas, United States. The monument was sculpted by Armando Hinojosa and erected by Tejano Monument, Inc. in 2012. It features nine life-size bronze statues on a 275-ton Texas Sunset Red Granite base, and five plaques describing Tejano history. ==See also== * 2012 in art ==References== Category:2012 establishments in Texas Category:2012 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Texas Category:Granite sculptures in Texas Category:Monuments and memorials in Texas Category:Outdoor sculptures in Austin, Texas Category:Statues in Texas
title: Tejano Monument
